edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

Class BoardPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.BoardPosition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScoredBoardPosition

    public class BoardPosition
extends java.lang.Object
    BoardPosition keeps track and informs of row and column information per object placed on the Board.
    Author:
    Alben Cheung, MD Ashfaqul Islam, Shaun Guth, Jerry Phul

      • DirectionFrom

        public BoardDirection DirectionFrom(BoardPosition position)
        Determine a BoardDirection that gets us closer to this position from the given position (given the constraints of the board (edges, etc)).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the direction the ghost should move to get to the current position
